report.title: Record data for verification
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the verification 3 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from samples s join surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false left join samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false left join locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false left join (index_locations_samples ils join locations locality on locality.id=ils.location_id and locality.location_type_id=#locality_type_id# ) on ils.sample_id=s.id left join (users u join people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false ) on u.id=s.created_by_id and u.id<>1 and u.deleted=false left join users uv on uv.id=s.verified_by_id and uv.deleted=false left join people pv on pv.id=uv.person_id and pv.deleted=false left join (sample_attribute_values srecv join sample_attributes sreca on sreca.id=srecv.sample_attribute_id and sreca.deleted=false and sreca.system_function='full_name' ) on srecv.sample_id=s.id and srecv.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where s.id=#sample_id#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to load

param.name: locality_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type used for verification localities
